article: Here is a picture where we can see grass growing in stones strongly. This picture _ me of my father, a most determined man. He was born in a very _ black family in the country, and both of my grandparents were _ .My father began to work in the cotton fields when he was seven years old. He had a strong desire to change his own fate ever since he was a little boy. He _ himself how to read and write in the evening. Later with his parents' _ he managed to go to school where he studied computer science at Yale University. He later became a professor of Stanford University and was an expert in programming. He could _ programs for supermarkets, restaurants, hotels, parks and bookstores all by himself. I'm _ of my father _ of his determination. The best way to know a strong man, I think, is to let him go through . Whenever we want to test a man's character, we should find out whether he can _ adversity , because adversity can always prove the _ character of a man.Only when we make up our own mind can we overcome any _ . Some people would give up halfway. Such men can hardly expect to succeed. If we do not give up hope, nothing is impossible.
